entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • osr stress arm64 - coreclr_initialize failed #77066
    8.0.0
  • Hidden version files in .NET runtime installation #77061
  • NativeAOT: Custom runtime without AppContext class throw #77054
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonSerializer overloads accepting non-generic JsonTypeInfo #77051
    8.0.0
  • VS Code failed to run .NET runtime on Ubuntu 20.04 on WSL2 #77048
  • [Mono][Arm64]Improve the performance of microbenchmarks #77046
    8.0.0
  • Blazor: Querying generic attributes does not work in Mono #77047
  • System.AccessViolationException when using current version (68.2.0.9) of Microsoft.ICU.ICU4C.Runtime with .NET SDK v6.0.402 #77045
    6.0.x
  • [FullPGO] Regressions in LinqBenchmarks due to delegate GDV #77041
    8.0.0
  • Query on Migrating from Newtonsoft to System.Text.Json #77040

Closed

  • Changing DateTimeFormatInfo.TimeSeparator on some cultures doesn't work because DateTimeFormatInfo's time patterns doesn't use ':' #77037
  • API documentation debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #43915
    Future
  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Private.Xml.Tests - GENERAL_FAILURE #76134
    7.0.x
  • System.Text.Json source generator doesn't with Visual Studio 17.3 #77053
  • Perf regressions in Perf_Matrix benchmarks #59415
    7.0.0
  • Streaming HttpContent and ReadAsStreamAsync #31316
    Future
  • String.StartsWith("\0") behavior change between .NET Framework and .NET 6 #77050
  • [API Proposal]: Add new overloads to ReadFromJsonAsync method in HttpContentJsonExtensions #72103
    8.0.0
  • CS8352 Cannot use variable 'result' in this context because it may expose referenced variables outside of their declaration scope #77036
  • File.Copy leads to deadlocks on Ubuntu Linux #76999
  • Throughput for Server workloads on ARM64 is comparable to x64 #70530
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Emit ICorProfiler ModuleLoadFinished for dynamic modules #77068
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Filter out addresses that are not in bookkeeping range during background promote #77067
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix loading app-local ICU #77065
    area-System.Globalization
  • Fixed a typo in a variable name #77062
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing new workload manifest targets changes #77058
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Updated NugetProjectModelVersion from 6.2.1 to 6.2.2. #77057
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Modify __int64 definition in PAL to match the OS definition #77056
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: introduce some SSA accounting and checking #77055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Target only net7.0 during source-build - Port of #75168 to main #77052
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • NativeAOT: remove some headers that are not needed #77042
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix failing `EvaluateBrowsableRootHidden` #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove non-deterministic signals from debugger tests. #77038
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Make sure all heap segment fields are populated in the DAC #77035
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: minor cleanup of some inlining methods #77009
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #76743
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.x
  • Align env var lookup in clrconfig and jithost #77025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "[wasm] Run System.Runtime tests in a deterministic order to w… #77063
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #77021
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add overloads to ReadFromJsonAsync #75989
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][ppc64le] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #76990
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Try changing alignment #76451
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Enable visual styles for host error dialog via activation context #76762
    area-Host
  • Use BitOperations in more places #76933
    area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2020499 #76907
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [PERF] Fix Linux arm64 AOT ROOTFS_DIR missing (Less Impactful) #77027
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use DOTNET_ variables in tests #76997
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection #76940
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Leverage the shipping, roslyn based ApiCompat in dotnet/runtime #73263
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [IGNORE]: System.Net.Mail Test Failure Fix testing #76361
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Fixes issue when monitoring a process launched via the same command line #76965
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add cecil as a dependency of the runtime #77029
    area-Infrastructure
  • Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76955
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Trim trailing SP and HTAB for header value on HTTP/1.1 #77030
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Don't copy coreclr version of coreclr and SPCL to core_root when targeting mono #76890
    area-Infrastructure
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Implement missing NAOT support (and fix garbage values passed to JIT in expandRawHandleIntrinsic) #76996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #76939
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, 7.0.x
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [JIT] x86 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • Avoid runtime "atomic write" check in ConcurrentDictionary for shared generics #77005
    area-System.Collections
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Check if interval interferes with the call #76904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Move Marshal-ilgen into a component #75542
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [WIP] statically linking GC PAL #76985
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Evaluate GDV call args early #75634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • #76596 update icu version for norwegian culture #77003
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Use hashcodes when looking up the JsonSerializerOptions global cache. #76782
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc fixes #76942
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #77026
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Clean near unmaintainable parallel logic 53593 #76949
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
